post.body: The killer feature for Twitter for me was the SMS messaging. Does any other service offer that? No Canadian SMS # for Jaiku :(
Yeah, I'm the Zunior podcast guy...late as it's going to be this month too.
DVDs are so 1990s. When can I get the DRM-free 1080p x264 download? I'd pay for that.
Why don't you ever post anything other than quotations?
I'm glad that you're twittering once again.
Grrrr...that link didn't work. But I was looking at the 42LG70 and the NS-LCD47HD-09
These are both great TVs...and they're on sale: http://tinyurl.com/6a4ocj
Yes, I think that's the one.
What season of Doctor Who are you watching?
Have you downloaded one of the myriad Twitter apps for your iPhone?
Welcome to twitter.
Why would you want to do such a thing?
Just returned from experimentally determining that my new(ish) jacket is water resistant.
#Twitter is no longer sending SMS updates to Canadian users: http://tinyurl.com/5bc73l Boo urns!
Finally getting my bamboo flooring put down by a professional. It's starting to look really good!
Lounging at home. Floorer got snowed in. Starting to think the plywood floors look really good.
Power is out on the whole block. Let the looting begin!
Finally settled in the new office. Working with 5 other guys in one room is...interesting.
Heard that a woman was run over by a dump truck on Sackville and Barrington. Can anyone confirm?
Wall-e was good. Julie thought it was boring. I guess I won't make her watch 2001.
Yet another floorer bailed on me. He swears he just forgot. Rescheduled for Monday. Cross your fingers :)
Quote from lunch: "Sorry, I almost killed you."
On a whim, tried the latest version of #Chrome. What a difference! All my problems have been resolved. It's Chrome or bust, baby!
Left my desk at the BMO building for perhaps the last time. Now sitting in the new digs up on Brunswick. What building is this, anyway?
New Zunior Podcast December 2008 http://tinyurl.com/63yozr
First of two holiday parties tonight. Time to get into the spirits...er, spirit. Whatever.
Just passed Peter Kelley shopping after hours at the Sackville Walmart. Don't ask.
Apparently, mine is the 5th Canadian twitter account. http://tinyurl.com/24qedz
Thinking about my company holiday party. There are very few people left in the office. I'm getting kind of antsy to leave here myself.
Thanks to Bill and Dejah of http://www.carouselrubberstamps.com for a bottle of Lagavulin, my favourite scotch.
